summary: TRANSFER CASE IN DODGE DURANGO SLT 4WD(1999) CRACKED IN HALF WHILE DRIVING. TOOK IT TO MY LOCAL TRANSMISSION PLACE AND AFTER FURTHER REVIEW, HE FOUND THE FRONT DRIVE SHAFT HAD WEAKENED(BROKE) WHICH DESTROYED THE U-JOINT WHICH CAUSED THE TRANSFER CASE TO CRACK.  WHEN HE CALLED DODGE TO ORDER A NEW FRONT DRIVE SHAFT, THEY SAID THEY WERE BACK ORDERED 2-3 WEEKS.  WHEN ASKED IF THERE WAS A PROBLEM WITH THIS PART, HE WAS TOLD NO.  BUT THE DRIVE SHAFT IS BACK ORDERED. HOW DOES THAT HAPPEN AND NOT HAVE A PROBLEM? *JB
